about_the_game:
This is not another isometric Action Roguelite game!
Revenge of the Mage puts you in the robes of a mage where you can experience all the action from the eyes of a mage. You have to destroy the hordes of the damned and collect their essences to power up yourself and save the multiverse!

Select Your Mage
Players can select their desired Ancestor! Every Ancestor has different colors that empower a certain element. You will start with a few, but many more will be added to your magical wardrobe. Every single one will introduce an alternative style. But remember, this journey is not for weak-hearted magic users!

Let the hands of fate open the ways of your Magic!
Every time you level up, you will be offered several spells out of unique 20+ passive cards (for now). Each of them can be upgraded several times for greater effect.

Revenge of the Mage offers a simple but fun experience. Remember, everything you will face and find is just the beginning.

  • You can play with many unique Active and Passive Spells.
  • Unlock different Ancestors for your desired gameplay.
  • Progress through!
  • Defeat powerful champions and bosses!
